name: Ghost Day Care
description:
In this game you are a frightened person that has to take care of some friendly ghosts.
To take care properly, you need to bring them to the light at the beginning of the stage.
If you are scared, you can go back to that same light to calm yourself.

Controls:

WASD/Move

LCTRL/Crouch

LMB/Shoot

SPACE/Jump

R/Reset

Play it on full screen. The web version could have some bugs with the screen, so if that happen you can always download the windows version.
